title: CS Practical Competency Enhancement: Experience-Based Self-Directed Language Teacher Competency Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more self-directed problem-solving strategies through real-classroom simulation
Learners can share knowledge and exchange feedback with peer teachers two or more times using digital platforms
Learners can create one or more new language teaching materials using digital literacy and empathetic communication skills in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
